member.name: T:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced
member.summary: Create stunning visualizations and responsive charts for your dashboards and data-centric applications.

member.name: M:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the control class.

member.name: T:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._theme
member.summary: Provides a list of predefined themes usable within the list of supported charts.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._theme.theme1
member.summary: Standard Theme 1.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._theme.theme2
member.summary: Standard Theme 2.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._theme.theme3
member.summary: Standard Theme 3.

member.name: T:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type
F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_column
member.summary: A column chart is a graphic representation of data. Column charts display vertical bars going across the chart horizontally, with the values axis being displayed on the left side of the chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_line
member.summary: A line chart or line graph is a type of chart which displays information as a series of data points called 'markers' connected by straight line segments. It is a basic type of chart common in many fields.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stepLine
member.summary: A chart similar to a line graph, but with the line forming a series of steps between data points.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_spline
member.summary: Spline charts integrate all the characteristics of a conventional line chart except for the fact that unlike line charts, which connect data points with straight lines, spline charts draw a fitted curved line to join the data points.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stepArea
member.summary: An area chart or area graph displays graphically quantitative data. It is based on the line chart. The area between axis and line are commonly emphasized with colors, textures and hatchings. Commonly one compares with an area chart two or more quantities.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_area
member.summary: An area chart or area graph displays graphically quantitative data. It is based on the line chart. The area between axis and line are commonly emphasized with colors, textures and hatchings. Commonly one compares with an area chart two or more quantities.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_splineArea
member.summary: An area chart or area graph displays graphically quantitative data. It is based on the line chart. The area between axis and line are commonly emphasized with colors, textures and hatchings.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_bar
member.summary: a diagram in which the numerical values of variables are represented by the height or length of lines or rectangles of equal width.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_pie
member.summary: The pie is a type of graph in which a circle is divided into sectors that each represent a proportion of the whole.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_doughnut
member.summary: Doughnut Charts. Definition. A doughnut chart looks similar to a pie chart but it can contain more than one data series. Like a pie chart a doughnut chart shows the relationship of parts to a whole.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_bubble
member.summary: A bubble chart is a type of chart that displays three dimensions of data. Each entity with its triplet (v1, v2, v3) of associated data is plotted as a disk that expresses two of the vi values through the disk's xy location and the third through its size.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_scatter
member.summary: A scatter plot is a set of points plotted on a horizontal and vertical axes. Scatter plots are important in statistics because they can show the extent of correlation, if any, between the values of observed quantities or phenomena (called variables).

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stackedColumn
member.summary: Represents a stacked column chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stackedColumn100
member.summary: Represents a stacked column-100 chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stackedArea
member.summary: Represents a stacked area chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stackedArea100
member.summary: Represents a stacked area-100 column chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stackedBar
member.summary: Represents a stacked bar chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_stackedBar100
member.summary: Represents a stacked bar-100 chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_rangeColumn
member.summary: Represents a range column chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_rangeBar
member.summary: Represents a range bar chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_rangeArea
member.summary: Represents a range area chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_rangeSplineArea
member.summary: Represents a range spline area chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_ohlc
member.summary: Represents an OHLC chart.

member.name: F:Bunifu.Dataviz.WinForms.BunifuDatavizAdvanced._type.Bunifu_candlestick
member.summary: Represents a candlestick chart.
